properties.name: MOUSE_UP
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the mouse is released after a click.

properties.name: MOUSE_DOWN
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the mouse button is clicked (without being released).

properties.name: MOUSE_ENTER
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the mouse pointer enters the area defined by the bounding box of the object.

properties.name: MOUSE_EXIT
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the mouse pointer exits the area defined by the bounding box of the object.

properties.name: ON_FOCUS
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the object receives focus, either through a mouse action or by pressing the Tab key.

properties.name: ON_BLUR
properties.description: Triggers the behavior when the focus moves to a different interactive object.
